title: Learn Spanish Fast!
description: This course is designed for beginners and intermediate learners who want to quickly master the basics of Spanish.
author: 66bf18e436852647642f92e3
subject: 64dfe1b2bcf86cd799439017

FAQ.question: What materials are included?
FAQ.answer: All course materials and practice exercises are provided.

FAQ.question: Do I need prior knowledge?
FAQ.answer: No prior knowledge of Spanish is required.

title: Mastering Python for Data Science
description: An advanced course for professionals who want to enhance their Python skills for data science applications.
author: 66bf18e436852647642f92e3
subject: 64dfe1b2bcf86cd799439019

FAQ.question: Is this course suitable for beginners?
FAQ.answer: This course is designed for those with a basic understanding of Python.

FAQ.question: What will I learn?
FAQ.answer: You'll learn advanced Python techniques and how to apply them in data science projects.

title: Introduction to Classical Music
description: Explore the world of classical music with this beginner-friendly course.
author: 66bf18e436852647642f92e3
subject: 64dfe1b2bcf86cd799439017

FAQ.question: Do I need any instruments?
FAQ.answer: No instruments are required; this course is an introduction to classical music.
